tit.e: Kuriyama Family Residence (the Japan's oldest private residence in Nara Prefecture)
Kuriyama Family Residence (the Japan's oldest private residence in Nara Prefecture)

sen.j: 栗山家住宅（くりやまけじゅうたく）とは、奈良県五條市五條1丁目にある建築年代の判明している民家として日本最古の建物。
sen.e: The Kuriyama Family Residence, which is located in 1-chome, Gojo, Gojo city, Nara Prefecture, is the Japan's oldest private residence of all the residences whose dates of building are known.
The Kuriyama Family Residence, which is located in 1-chome, Gojo, Gojo city, Nara Prefecture, is the Japan's oldest private residence of all the residences whose dates of building are known.
The Kuriyama Family Residence, which is located in 1-chome, Gojo, Gojo city, Nara Prefecture, is the Japan's oldest private residence of all the residences whose dates of building are known.

sen.j: 改修時に棟札から1607年（慶長12年）築と判明。
sen.e: During the time of innovation it became known from the ridge plates that the residence was built in 1607.
During the time of innovation it became known from the ridge plates that the residence was built in 1607.
During the time of innovation it became known from the ridge plates that the residence was built in 1607.

sen.j: 重要文化財だが、現在も住居として使用している為に非公開となっている。
sen.e: Though it is an important cultural property, it is closed to the public because it is still used as a residence.
It is an important cultural property, but closed to the public since it is still used as a residence.
sen.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。
sen.e: It is an important cultural property, but closed to the public since it is still used as a residence.
